title: OpenClaw Initial Release
description: OpenClaw launches with groundbreaking features including memory search, plugin system, and multi-channel support.

title: Channels Architecture & Memory System
description: Major architectural shift: chat providers renamed to 'channels' with auto-migration. Memory system enhanced with vector search.

title: Web Tools & Browser Control
description: Introduction of web_search and web_fetch tools powered by Brave API, plus Chrome extension relay for browser automation.
highlights: Web search with Brave API integration

title: Security & Provider Auth
description: Enhanced security with provider auth registry, encrypted token storage, and improved remote CDP support.

title: Hooks System & Media Understanding
description: Revolutionary hooks system with bundled hooks and comprehensive media understanding (image/audio/video).

title: Control UI Refresh & ACP Integration
description: Major UI overhaul with enhanced TUI, memory tools, and ACP (Agent Communication Protocol) for IDE integrations.

title: Identity & Approval System
description: Custom assistant identities with avatars, exec approval system, and major cache optimizations.
highlights: Custom identity avatars in Control UI
Exec approval gates with elevated modes

title: Compaction Safeguard Enhancement
description: Adaptive chunking with progressive fallback for compaction, improving reliability.

title: TTS Core & HTTP Tools API
description: Text-to-speech moved to core with model-driven tags. New HTTP endpoint for direct tool invocation.

title: Ollama & LINE Support
description: Ollama discovery with documentation and LINE messaging API plugin.

title: OpenClaw Rebrand
description: Complete rebrand from Clawdbot to OpenClaw with strengthened security and gateway improvements.

title: CLI Completion & Build Optimization
description: Shell completion commands and faster TypeScript builds with tsdown/tsgo.

title: Feishu Integration & Agents Dashboard
description: Major feature release with Feishu/Lark plugin support, Web UI Agents dashboard, and QMD memory backend.
highlights: Web UI Agents dashboard for managing agent files/tools/skills
QMD memory backend for workspace context
Healthcheck skill and bootstrap audit guidance
Security hardening: operator approvals, access-group gating, SSRF checks

title: Telegram TypeScript Cleanup & Cron Improvements
description: Comprehensive Telegram codebase TypeScript migration and enhanced cron job delivery modes.
highlights: Cron announce delivery mode for isolated jobs

title: Model Expansion & Token Dashboard
description: Support for Anthropic Opus 4.6, OpenAI Codex gpt-5.3, xAI Grok provider, and Web UI token usage dashboard.
highlights: Anthropic Opus 4.6 and OpenAI Codex gpt-5.3-codex support

title: iOS Node App & Device Pairing
description: Revolutionary iOS node app with device pairing and phone control plugins for cross-device automation.
highlights: iOS alpha node app with setup-code onboarding

title: Security Hardening & Hook System Improvements
description: Comprehensive security hardening with SSRF protection, webhook verification, and hook session routing fixes.
highlights: SSRF protection for URL-based file/image inputs
Hook session routing hardening with defaultSessionKey
50+ bug fixes across channels and subsystems

title: Discord Components v2 & Nested Subagents
description: Major release featuring Discord interactive components, nested subagents, and extensive security hardening.
highlights: Cron webhook delivery with auth tokens
15+ security fixes including sandbox and XSS patches

title: 1M Context & iOS Share Extension
description: Feature release with 1M context beta support, iOS Share extension, and major platform integrations.
highlights: iOS Background Listening & Voice Directive Hint
Slack native streaming, Telegram inline buttons
Memory search FTS fallback with query expansion

title: External Secrets & ACP Thread Agents
description: Major milestone with full secrets management workflow, ACP thread-bound agents, and Android node support.
highlights: External Secrets Management (audit, configure, apply, reload)
Agents CLI bindings for route management
